item.description:
As many of you know, our first Meetup of 2010 (on 1/2) was canceled due to bad weather.

At that time, we couldn't reschedule during January because our venue, the Presbyterian Church in Needham, was booked solid for the rest of the month.

However, the church hall is now available on Saturday 1/23 due to a cancellation, so we can hold a "makeup Meetup" on that date. So please RSVP right now, while you're thinking of it.

More details to come.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Special Makeup Meetup on Saturday 1/23
